import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Axios from "../axios.js"; const Form = () => { const [workouts, setWorkout] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchAllWorkout = async () => { try { const res = await Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api"); setWorkout(res.data); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; fetchAllWorkout(); }, []); return (

Employee Details

Add Employee
{workouts.map((row) => { return ( ); })}
ID Workouts Load Reps Edit Delete
{row.id} {row.workout} {row.loads} {row.reps}
Click Confirm to delete
); }; export default Form;
